about_the_game:
Discord URL :

【Story】


Guided by a mysterious girl, adventurers challenge a labyrinth that changes its shape with every entry, aiming for the lowest layer.
A new sensation RPG that adds soul-like and rogue-lite elements to a Wizardry-like 3D dungeon RPG.

【System】


This is a roguelike game based on the classic 3D dungeon RPG!

- Players challenge randomly generated 3D dungeons with their companions each time!
- Various events occur randomly within the dungeon! You can enjoy a different adventure each time!
- Customize your characters freely with special beads created through item alchemy!
- Various events, such as merchants and traps, occur inside the dungeon!

This RPG has a high level of difficulty, but there are dungeons where bringing items is allowed, letting players adjust the difficulty themselves.
Furthermore, by experiencing death repeatedly, your understanding of the labyrinth will deepen, allowing you to feel your own growth!

【Regarding Video Posting & Streaming】

Please include the URL to the "Soul Wizards & Roguelite" Steam store page in the description section.
Feel free to monetize as well.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest macOS Release
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Soul Wizards & Roguelite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Adventurers led by a mysterious girl take on the challenge of a labyrinth that reshapes itself with every entry, aiming for the deepest layer. This title is a new kind of RPG that introduces soul-like and rogue-lite elements into a Wizardry-like 3D dungeon RPG.
